title: Trine.2.Complete.Story.LINUX-HI2U
description:
HI2U

Trine 2: Complete Story (c) Frozenbyte

Release date : 30th of September, 2013
Protection   :
Type         : Action Adventure
Size         : 62 x 50 mb
Platform     : Linux

Note

This was released recently, around the same time as the OSX version
If there is interest, we might do more game releases for Linux

Description

Immerse yourself in brilliantly rich graphics and a wondrous
magical world in this side-scrolling action-puzzle platformer.
You'll need to make use of a wizard, a thief, and a knight and
their unique abilities in order to complete puzzles and defeat
nasty-looking goblins and frightening dragons in Trine 2: Complete
Story. Play by yourself and toggle between all 3 characters or
play with up to 2 other friends in co-op mode. Trine 2: Complete
Story includes the Goblin Menace expansion campaign and the
Dwarven Caverns level.

Install

Unrar, unpack the archive, run the game using ./trine2.sh.
Enjoy.

Check the readme folder for further instructions
